Mod7_Description: Casting {c_important}Double Swing{/c} while {c_important}{u}Berserking{/u}{/c} grants {c_number}{SF_9}{/c} additional seconds of {c_important}{u}Berserking{/u}{/c}.
Mod5_Description: Hitting an enemy with both hits of {c_important}Double Swing{/c} makes them {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_6}]{/c} second.
Mod4_Description: If {c_important}Double Swing{/c} damages a Stunned or Knocked Down enemy, gain {c_number}{SF_8}{/c} Fury.
simple_desc: Fury Skill: While dual wielding, sweep your weapons inward, dealing damage with each weapon.
name: Double Swing
